name: Kitty Run
description: An amusing and complicated runner about Kitty. You play as a cat who must save his kittens. Jump through the barriers and stay alive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
